Dogecoin

The first and best meme cryptocurrency

Dogecoin features the Shiba Inu dog from the "Doge" internet meme as its logo and namesake

Timeline

  • Nov/2013 - Dogecoin is launched on twitter by Jackson Palmer and Billy Markus.
  • Dec/2013 - The Hack of DogeWallet makes users lose 21 million coins.
  • Jan/2013 - Doge raises 26 million coins for the Jamaican bobsled team.
  • Aug/2014 - Merged mining with Litecoin is introduced.
  • Oct/2014 - Twitch starts accepting Doge.
  • Jan/2015 - Silk road starts accepting Doge.
  • Mar/2015 - Enclava, a micronation, declares Doge as its official coin.
  • Mar/2015 - Jackson Palmer leaves the dev team.
  • Sep/2016 - iPhone 7 adopts Doge.
  • May/2017 - Dogetipbot is closed.
  • Jun/2017 - Jackson Palmer comes back.
  • Jan/2018 - Doge hits 1 billion dollars in market cap.
  • Jun/2018 - First Dogecon.
  • Dec/2020 - Elon Musk tweets about Doge.
  • Mar/2021 - Dogecoin Exchange ‘DogeDEX’ is launched.
  • May/2021 - Elon Musk starts investing in Dogecoin development.
  • Aug/2021 - Price jumps amid #dogecointo1dollar trending across social media.
  • Aug/2021 - The Dogecoin Foundation is relaunched.

Please Check the Dogecoin Official Website
